Aloha.title: Aloha
Aloha.byline: Aloha is a community of 54,000 people (2020) in Oregon, under 10 miles (16 km) to the west of Portland (Oregon).

Alonissos.title: Alonissos
Alonissos.byline: Alonnisos or Alonissos (population 2,750 in 2011) is the least touristed island in the Sporades Islands.

Alor Archipelago.title: Alor Archipelago
Alor Archipelago.byline: Alor Archipelago is an island group in Nusa Tenggara, Indonesia.

Alor Setar.title: Alor Setar
Alor Setar.byline: Alor Setar is the state capital of Kedah, on the west coast of Peninsular Malaysia.

Alotau.title: Alotau
Alotau.byline: Alotau is the provincial capital of Milne Bay, Papua New Guinea.

Alor Gajah.title: Alor Gajah
Alor Gajah.byline: Alor Gajah is a town in Alor Gajah District, Melaka, Malaysia.

Alona Beach.title: Alona Beach
Alona Beach.byline: Alona Beach is on Panglao Island in Bohol province, Philippines.
